name: Satheru, the Mayhem Beast
description:
This project is running with an #itchfunding. If you can, please, help this game reach the goals 🤗 A solo journaling misadventure across the Altos Seas of Mour🐉 Beyond the sea, it is still Meradosia's sea, and beyond there, it is still Meradosia's sea. But Meradosia is also Mour, a place of yours and mine, which transcends time or space, dimensions. Well, look closer, it seems that there is a little bit of you here too, so let's hear it, come and tell your story.

A Satheru, the Mayhem Beast is a Solo TTRPG game about  misadventure. In this game, you'll take on the role of a character who will end up unwittingly embarking on a misadventure across the Altos Seas of Mour in search of a mythological creature, the Satheru. You will record your entire experience in a diary and through anonymous letters thrown into the sea. StMB is a game that seeks to explore emotions, uncertainties, judgment of the world and people, personality and desires of your character. Will you face it?

IMPORTANT: Despite its poetic tone and narrative perspective, StMB is a personal challenge suitable for mature adults. Please immersion is fun, but be careful with yourself and your feelings in the course of your experience, your physical and psychological health are more important than the game. The “trauma” is a key but minimal element, reconfigured and proposed in an imaginary environment in which the main goal is to overcome this. For that matter, under no circumstances use personal experiences or some that make you uncomfortable to build your character. StMB is a game that has no intention of healing or being used as a treatment for psychological or physical trauma!

Playtest Session

StMB is a development project with regular updates. You can help the development of this game with feedbacks and opinions. Both this game and the whole universe is made for you, so first of all, have fun.

In this project you will find:

  • The Story: You can build the universe of Mour in your own way, using the appendices like creative reference.
  • Appendices: A collection of appendices on paragraphs and keywords that will help you build your narrative.
  • Basic Rules: Rules to aid your misadventure, from building your character to developing your story.
  • Tarot System: A system of meanings and values for Major Arcana tarot cards that will build your narrative.

At the end of the project, an aged style tarot card design and illustrations made with watercolor and inspired by the Old School tattoo style will be created.

To share your impressions about StMB, you can share on socials with the hashtag #stmb or on comments session, and you can also follow the whole development in the #Logs.

Languages

If you find an error or would like to share any opinion or suggestion, please feel free to mail me. This project was translated independently and the author does not have command of the English language. If you want to help with tips and corrections, you will be collaborating with the development of this humble project.

Why buy it

By buying this game, you will be helping an independent artist and will have access to all future updates, like: English and Portuguese version with professional translation and proofreading, custom tarot deck printable file, and other extra.

Goals

This project is running with an #itchfunding. If you can, please, help this game reach the goals 🤗

$300 - Professional translation and proofreading + Intro Flavor to Mour universe.

$400 - New illustrations + Layout.

$500 - Custom Old School Tattoo style deck of Major Arcana (Print & Play).
